SELECT p.place_id, p.place_nm, pp.picture_source FROM place p JOIN place_picture pp ON p.place_id = pp.place_id JOIN room r ON p.place_id = r.place_id WHERE p.status = 'active' AND (#{location} = 0 OR p.loc_id = #{location}) AND (#{category} = 'All' OR p.category = #{category}) AND #{guests} BETWEEN r.min_people AND r.max_people AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM unavailable_date ud WHERE ud.room_id = r.room_id AND DATE_FORMAT(ud.reserved_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ) GROUP BY p.place_id;
